        public static boolean readMore(ByteBuffer buf,
                               WebSocketImpl ws,
                               WrappedByteChannel channel)
                        throws IOException
        Parameters:
        buf - The ByteBuffer to read from
        ws - The WebSocketImpl associated with the channels
